reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: The CITES (the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora) Sponsored Delegates

description.narrative: Ensure that the environment and the natural resources upon which human lives and livelihoods depend are managed in ways that sustain productivity growth, a healthy population, as well as the intrinsic spiritual and cultural value of the environment.

This award strives to ensure that the environment and the natural resources upon which human lives and livelihoods depend are managed in ways that sustain productivity growth, a healthy population, as well as the intrinsic spiritual and cultural value of the environment. More specifically, this award includes CITES CoP17 (Conference of the Parties) Sponsored Delegates Project: Sponsoring developing country delegates to participate in the 17th meeting of the Conference of the Parties to CITES (the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora) in South Africa, 24 September - 05 October 2016..
